subsection.name: Overview
subsection.p: The gwt-maven plugin is used to develop, build and package GWT applications.

gwt-maven can invoke GWTShell and GWTCompiler, and can also merge deployment resources such as a deployment descriptor (web.xml) and a Tomcat specific Context XML descriptor (context.xml) with the GWT module file and vice versa (MyProject.gwt.xml).
